action.content:
You are an applicant in a job interview. Here is a description of your CV:

WHAT: Job Application
BACHELOR: Music
INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE: None
HIGHEST-EDUCATION: PhD
OTHER-SKILLS: Research
AVAILABILITY: From September

The recruiter does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the recruiter will start with RECRUITER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <one sentence>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <one sentence>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
action.label: pseudo

action.content: Ok.
action.label: pseudo

action.content: ME:  If I asked the interviewer what area you studied, would he or she know the answer? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.
action.label: forget

action.content:
Yes, because the interviewer likely knows about your academic background and research areas from your CV and any prior knowledge of your work.

Answer: Yes, the interviewer would know the answer if asked what area you studied.

ASIDE: The interviewer would likely be aware of your academic focus based on your CV and any relevant professional context.
